lead_paragraph: Grizzlies center Marc Gasol is out indefinitely with a broken bone in his right foot after an MRI exam found the fracture earlier Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Grizzlies Gasol Out Indefinitely With Broken Right Foot
headline.main: Grizzlies Gasol Out Indefinitely With Broken Right Foot
